text: GOT7 reveals the music video of its new title track "Hard Carry"
GOT7 releases its second LP entitled "Flight Log: Turbulence"
The album is a continuation of the previous EP released in March
The album emphasizes GOT7's tougher and manlier sides...
... as the members overcome turbulence in the sky
The tracks reveal the charismatic, masculine side of the group
The members show off their stuff more intensely
"Hard Carry," a gaming term that refers to a strong player who can hold their own
The album features 13 songs in total
The members contributed to the writing and composition of 11 songs
"Hard Carry" is an EDM trap song that highlights a pulsing 808 bass kick and unique synth-lead sound
